I have my mom write kind words to make people feel happy like when they are with their frinds [sic]. I have painted and set out over 100 rocks and people like them and smile and that makes me smile."

*** New site added! Beginning March 30, families may pick-up meals at Greenway Middle School located at 3002 E. Nisbet Rd. ***

PVSchools Nutrition & Wellness will continue providing meals to any child 18 years of age or younger, regardless of application status or school enrollment. Per USDA regulations, all children must be present at the time when picking up meals. See flyer for details.

Please note: Breakfast/lunch combo packs can be picked up by a drive-thru or walk-up procedure only (no one will be allowed to go inside) to ensure safety for everyone involved. Employees will be handing out the bags with gloves and will be following all food safety precautions during the process.

Federal requirements are for parents/guardians to have their children accompany them to receive the breakfast/lunch combo packs, and this is what we must follow. A suggestion would be to use the drive-up option, rather than walk-up, and have your child remain in the backseat with windows in the back kept up.
